adjective.description: Denoting a subdivision of the Jurassic period, of which the formations near the English city of Bath are typical.
examples: marine limestones of Bathonian to Kimmeridgian age

adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the English city of Bath or its inhabitants.
examples: a notable Bathonian member of the community

noun.description: The Bathonian period or the system of rocks deposited during it.
examples: the end of the Bathonian was characterized by basaltic volcanism

noun.description: An inhabitant of the English city of Bath.

origin: Mid 18th century (in Bathonian (sense 2 of the adjective)): from Bathonia Latinized name of Bath in England + -an.
